hero.title: Web solutions for
hero.subtitle: I create modern websites, e-commerce platforms and automate business processes. From personal projects to corporate solutions.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer with focus on quality and results

hero.intro: A passionate web developer and automation expert based in Geneva, Switzerland. I transform complex business challenges into elegant digital solutions that drive growth and efficiency.

started.title: How It All Started
started.content: My journey into web development began during my university years when I discovered the power of code to solve real-world problems. What started as curiosity quickly became a passion for creating digital solutions that make a difference.

growing.title: Growing & Learning
growing.content: Over the years, I've worked with startups and established companies, helping them scale their digital presence. Each project taught me something new and reinforced my belief that technology should be accessible, efficient, and beautiful.

mission.title: My Mission Today
mission.content: Today, I focus on helping businesses leverage technology to achieve their goals. Whether it's building a stunning website, developing a complex web application, or automating business processes, I'm here to turn your vision into reality.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit built through years of hands-on experience and continuous learning in the ever-evolving world of web development.

values.title: My Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide my work and shape how I approach every project and client relationship.

passion.title: Passion-Driven
passion.description: I genuinely love what I do. Every project is an opportunity to create something meaningful and impactful.

client.title: Client-Focused
client.description: Your success is my success. I work closely with clients to understand their needs and exceed expectations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: I stay current with the latest technologies and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

results.title: Results-Oriented
results.description: Every line of code serves a purpose. I focus on delivering measurable results and business value.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Deadlines matter. I pride myself on delivering projects on time and maintaining clear communication.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Clean, maintainable code and thorough testing ensure your project stands the test of time.

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
cta.subtitle: I'm always excited to take on new challenges and help bring your ideas to life. Let's discuss how we can work together to achieve your goals.

services.title: What I do
services.subtitle: Full development cycle from idea to launch with focus on results and quality

hero.title: Services That Drive Growth
hero.subtitle: From concept to deployment, I provide end-to-end web development solutions that transform your ideas into powerful digital experiences that deliver results.

process.title: My Development Process
process.subtitle: A proven methodology that ensures your project is delivered on time, within budget, and exceeds expectations.

discovery.title: Discovery & Analysis
discovery.description: Understanding your business needs, target audience, and project requirements

strategy.title: Strategy & Planning
strategy.description: Creating a comprehensive roadmap with timeline, architecture, and design approach

development.title: Development & Testing
development.description: Building your solution with clean code, regular testing, and progress updates

launch.title: Launch & Optimization
launch.description: Deploying your project and providing ongoing support and optimization

cta.subtitle: Let's discuss your requirements and create something amazing together.

technologies.title: Technologies & Expertise

testimonial.quote: Yulia transformed our outdated website into a modern, high-performing platform that exceeded all our expectations. The attention to detail and professionalism was outstanding.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson, CEO at TechStart Solutions
